item.title: This is the future of senior housing
item.description: Older consumers — and their adult children — now have more education and higher technological expectations.

item.title: If millions of dead people are stealing from Social Security, then why can’t the DOJ find any of them?
item.description: Why the ‘dead people collecting Social Security’ narrative just won’t die

item.title: How the ‘trade of the year’ in the bond market became a nightmare for investors after Trump’s tariffs
item.description: Here is what’s at stake as a lesser-known “basis trade” came undone this week, just before President Trump’s mini-pivot on tariffs.

item.title: Why does Trump love those ‘beautiful’ tariffs? It didn’t start with China.
item.description: “Make America Great Again” longs for an America that can never be again.

item.title: My cousin died before receiving our uncle’s $2M inheritance. Will the rest of the family receive this money instead?
item.description: “His trust named his son as the only beneficiary of his home and had no alternate beneficiaries.”
